awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 1 win & 4 nominations.

fullplot: An ordinary British family and their friend are accused of murder when a stranger dies at their dinner table. Black Pond is an existential comedy drama starring two-time BAFTA winner Chris Langham and double British Comedy Award Winner Simon Amstell.
